name: arbor-aed
label: Netscout AED
description: Netscout Arbor Edge Defense (AED) secures the internet data center edge from threats against availability â€” specifically from application-layer, distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Specify the server URL of the Netscout AED instance.
fields.tooltip: Specify the server URL of the Netscout AED instance.

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.description: Specify the API Key generated in Netscout AED instance.
fields.tooltip: Specify the API Key generated in Netscout AED instance.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Countries
operations.description: Retrieves the Netscout AED country codes and names based on the country names and other filter criteria you have specified.

parameters.title: Queue
parameters.name: q
parameters.tooltip: Specify the list of country names, separated by a +, based on which you want to filter the results of this operation.
parameters.description: Specify the list of country names, separated by a +, based on which you want to filter the results of this operation.

parameters.title: Response Fields
parameters.name: select
parameters.placeholder: Eg. country,name or name or country
parameters.tooltip: Specify the list of keys, separated by a +, based on which you want to filter the results of this operation.
parameters.description: Specify the list of keys, separated by a +, based on which you want to filter the results of this operation.

parameters.title: Sort
parameters.name: sort_param
parameters.tooltip: Specify the sorting criteria to sort the results retrieved by this operation. You can use either the country or the name as the sorting key. By default, this is set to name.
parameters.description: Specify the sorting criteria to sort the results retrieved by this operation. You can use either the country or the name as the sorting key. By default, this is set to name.

parameters.title: Direction
parameters.name: direction
parameters.tooltip: Select the sorting order in which to sort the results of this operation. Note: This parameter can only be used when the "Sort" parameter is specified.
parameters.description: Select the sorting order in which to sort the results of this operation. Note: This parameter can only be used when the "Sort" parameter is specified.

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify the index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say countries starting from the 10th country. By default, this is set as 1.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say countries starting from the 10th country. By default, this is set as 1.

parameters.title: Records Per Page
parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Specify the number of results per page that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of results per page that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10.

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.description: Other fields that you want to use to filter results returned by this operation. You can find these fields in Endpoints API Documentation on your AED setup.
parameters.tooltip: Other fields that you want to use to filter results returned by this operation. You can find these fields in Endpoints API Documentation on your AED setup.
parameters.name: other_fields

operations.title: Create Inbound Protection Groups
operations.description: Creates an Netscout AED protection group based on the protection group name, IP addresses, protection group server type, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Protection Group Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the protection group to create in Netscout AED.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the protection group to create in Netscout AED.

parameters.title: IP Addresses or CIDRs
parameters.name: prefixes
parameters.description:
Specify the list of comma-separated IP addresses or CIDRs to the protection group being created in Netscout AED.  

NOTE: Any IP Addresses or CIDRs that do not match the IP version of the specified protection group server type is ignored.
parameters.tooltip:
Specify the list of comma-separated IP addresses or CIDRs to the protection group being created in Netscout AED.  

NOTE: Any IP Addresses or CIDRs that do not match the IP version of the specified protection group server type is ignored.

parameters.title: Protection Group Server Type
parameters.name: serverType
parameters.description: Specify the Netscout AED group server type in which to create the protection group.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Netscout AED group server type in which to create the protection group.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Specify the description of the protection group being created in Netscout AED.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the description of the protection group being created in Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Active
parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Select this checkbox to set the mode of the protection group to Active in Netscout AED.
parameters.tooltip: Select this checkbox to set the mode of the protection group to Active in Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Protection Level
parameters.name: protectionLevel
parameters.description: Protection level that you want to set for the protection group that you want to create in Netscout AED. You can choose from the following options: None = use the global protection level, 1 = Low (default), 2 = Medium, and 3 = High
parameters.tooltip: Protection level that you want to set for the protection group that you want to create in Netscout AED. You can choose from the following options: None = use the global protection level, 1 = Low (default), 2 = Medium, and 3 = High

operations.title: Get Inbound Protection Groups
operations.description: Retrieves all the inbound protection groups or specific inbound protection groups from the Netscout AED protection groups based on the protection group identifier, name, and other filter criteria you have specified.

parameters.title: Protection Group Identifier
parameters.name: pgid
parameters.description: Specify the protection group identifier to filter the results retrieved from Netscout AED.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the protection group identifier to filter the results retrieved from Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Protection Group Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the protection group to filter the results retrieved from Netscout AED.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the protection group to filter the results retrieved from Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Specify the description of the protection group to filter the results retrieved from Netscout AED.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the description of the protection group to filter the results retrieved from Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Created Time
parameters.name: timeCreated
parameters.tooltip: Select the time of the creation of the protection group to filter the results retrieved from Netscout AED.
parameters.description: Select the time of the creation of the protection group to filter the results retrieved from Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Active
parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Mode, Active or Inactive, of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Netscout AED. Selecting this option sets the mode of the protection group to 'Active'.
parameters.tooltip: Mode, Active or Inactive, of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Netscout AED. Selecting this option sets the mode of the protection group to 'Active'.

parameters.title: Protection Level
parameters.name: protectionLevel
parameters.description: Protection level, None, Low, Medium, or High of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Netscout AED.
parameters.tooltip: Protection level, None, Low, Medium, or High of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Sort
parameters.name: sort_param
parameters.tooltip: Specify the sorting key used to sort the protection groups retrieved by this operation.
parameters.description: Specify the sorting key used to sort the protection groups retrieved by this operation.

parameters.title: Direction
parameters.name: direction
parameters.tooltip: Direction in which you want to sort the results of this operation. You can choose between Ascending or Descending. Note: This parameter can only be used when the "Sort" parameter is specified.
parameters.description: Direction in which you want to sort the results of this operation. You can choose between Ascending or Descending. Note: This parameter can only be used when the "Sort" parameter is specified.

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify the page number from which results are to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records. By default, this is set as 1.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which results are to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records. By default, this is set as 1.

parameters.title: Records Per Page
parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Specify the number of results per page that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of results per page that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10.

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.tooltip: Other fields that you want to use to filter results returned by this operation. You can find these fields in Endpoints API Documentation on your AED setup.
parameters.description: Other fields that you want to use to filter results returned by this operation. You can find these fields in Endpoints API Documentation on your AED setup.
parameters.name: other_fields

operations.title: Update Inbound Protection Groups
operations.description: Modifies the mode or the protection level for specific inbound protection groups based on the protection group IDs you have specified.

parameters.title: Protection Group IDs
parameters.name: pgid
parameters.tooltip: Specify a comma-separated list of protection group IDs to update in Netscout AED.
parameters.description: Specify a comma-separated list of protection group IDs to update in Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Active
parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Mode, Active or Inactive, of the protection group that you want to update in Netscout AED. Selecting this option sets the mode of the protection group to 'Active'.
parameters.tooltip: Mode, Active or Inactive, of the protection group that you want to update in Netscout AED. Selecting this option sets the mode of the protection group to 'Active'.

parameters.title: Protection Level
parameters.name: protectionLevel
parameters.description: Protection level that you want to set for the protection group that you want to update in Netscout AED. You can choose from the following options: None = use the global protection level, 1 = Low (default), 2 = Medium, and 3 = High
parameters.tooltip: The protection level (None = use the global protection level, 1 = low, 2 = medium, 3 = high). Default: 1

operations.title: Add Inbound Blacklist Countries
operations.description: Adds one or more countries to the Netscout AED blocked-list based on the country codes and protection group IDs (PGID) or central configuration IDs (CID) you have specified.

parameters.title: Country Code
parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Specify the ISO-standardized country code or a comma-separated list of country codes to add to the blocked-list in Netscout AED.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ISO-standardized country code or a comma-separated list of country codes to add to the blocked-list in Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Select CID or PGID
parameters.name: cid_pgid

Central Configuration ID.title: Central Configuration ID
Central Configuration ID.name: cid
Central Configuration ID.description: A specific central configuration ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.
Central Configuration ID.tooltip: A specific central configuration ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.

Protection Group ID.title: Protection Group ID
Protection Group ID.name: pgid
Protection Group ID.description: A specific protection group ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter.
Protection Group ID.tooltip: A specific protection group ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter.

parameters.tooltip: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to add the country to the blacklist in Netscout AED.
parameters.description: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to add the country to the blacklist in Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Annotation
parameters.name: annotation
parameters.tooltip: Specify a message to associate with each country that you add to the deny list.
parameters.description: Specify a message to associate with each country that you add to the deny list.

operations.title: Get Inbound Blacklisted Countries
operations.description: Retrieves all the inbound blocked-list countries or specific inbound blocked-list countries based on the country codes, protection group IDs, central configuration IDs, or other filter criteria you have specified. By default, 10 blocked-list countries are returned. An ID of -1 selects countries that are in the global blocked-list.

parameters.title: Country Code
parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Specify the ISO-standardized country code or a comma-separated list of country codes to retrieve from the blocked-list in Netscout AED.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ISO-standardized country code or a comma-separated list of country codes to retrieve from the blocked-list in Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Select CID or PGID
parameters.name: cid_pgid

Central Configuration ID.title: Central Configuration ID
Central Configuration ID.name: cid
Central Configuration ID.description: List of ‘,’ delimited central configuration IDs. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.
Central Configuration ID.tooltip: List of ‘,’ delimited central configuration IDs. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.

Protection Group ID.title: Protection Group ID
Protection Group ID.name: pgid
Protection Group ID.description: List of ‘,’ delimited protection group IDs. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter.
Protection Group ID.tooltip: List of ‘,’ delimited protection group IDs. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter.

parameters.tooltip: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to retrieve the countries that are part of the blacklist in Netscout AED.
parameters.description: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to retrieve the countries that are part of the blacklist in Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Update Time
parameters.name: updateTime
parameters.description: Specify the last updated or set time to filter results of this operation.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the last updated or set time to filter results of this operation.

parameters.title: Queue
parameters.name: q
parameters.tooltip: Specify a list of + delimited key values based on which to filter the results of this operation.
parameters.description: Specify a list of + delimited key values based on which to filter the results of this operation.

parameters.title: Response Fields
parameters.name: select
parameters.placeholder: Eg. country,updateTime,cid or name or country etc.
parameters.tooltip: Specify a list of comma-separated keys to include in the results of this operation.
parameters.description: Specify a list of comma-separated keys to include in the results of this operation.

parameters.title: Sort
parameters.name: sort_param
parameters.tooltip: Key used to sort the countries retrieved by this operation.
parameters.description: Key used to sort the countries retrieved by this operation.

parameters.title: Direction
parameters.name: direction
parameters.tooltip: Direction in which you want to sort the results of this operation. You can choose between Ascending or Descending. By default, this page will be sorted in the 'Ascending' order of country code. Note: This parameter can only be used when the "Sort" parameter is specified.
parameters.description: Direction in which you want to sort the results of this operation. You can choose between Ascending or Descending. By default, this page will be sorted in the 'Ascending' order of country code. Note: This parameter can only be used when the "Sort" parameter is specified.

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify the page number from which results are to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records. By default, this is set as 1.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page number from which results are to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records. By default, this is set as 1.

parameters.title: Records Per Page
parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Specify the number of results per page that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of results per page that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10.

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.tooltip: Other fields that you want to use to filter results returned by this operation. You can find these fields in Endpoints API Documentation on your AED setup.
parameters.description: Other fields that you want to use to filter results returned by this operation. You can find these fields in Endpoints API Documentation on your AED setup.
parameters.name: other_fields

operations.title: Remove Inbound Blacklisted Countries
operations.description: Removes one or more countries from the Netscout AED blocked-list for a specific protection group or for all protection groups based on the country codes, protection group IDs, central configuration IDs, or other filter criteria you have specified.

parameters.title: Country
parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Specify the ISO-standardized country code or a comma-separated list of country codes to remove from the blocked-list in Netscout AED.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ISO-standardized country code or a comma-separated list of country codes to remove from the blocked-list in Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Select CID or PGID
parameters.name: cid_pgid

Central Configuration ID.title: Central Configuration ID
Central Configuration ID.name: cid
Central Configuration ID.description: A specific central configuration ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.

Protection Group ID.title: Protection Group ID
Protection Group ID.name: pgid
Protection Group ID.description: A specific protection group ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter
Protection Group ID.tooltip: A specific protection group ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter

parameters.tooltip: Select Central Configuration ID (cid) or Protection Group ID (pgid) based on which you want to remove the country from the blacklist in Netscout AED.

parameters.tooltip: Specify one, or multiple comma-separated hosts (IP4 or IPv6) or CIDRs, to add to the blocked-list in Netscout AED.

Protection Group ID.tooltip: A specific protection group ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter

parameters.tooltip: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to remove the hosts from the whitelist in Netscout AED.
parameters.description: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to remove the hosts from the whitelist in Netscout AED.

operations.title: Execute an API Call
operations.description: Sends an API request to any API endpoint based on specified HTTP method, endpoint, and other input parameters that you have specified, enabling flexible API interactions tailored to user needs.

parameters.name: method
parameters.title: HTTP Method
parameters.description:
Select an HTTP action for the request. You can select from the following options:  

DELETE 

GET 

PATCH 

POST 

PUT

parameters.title: Endpoint
parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.tooltip: Specify the target API URL path for example: protection-groups/allowed-hosts/
parameters.description:
Specify the target API URL path for the request. 
For example, if the website is "https://example.com " and URL path is "/images/pic.jpg". The endpoint would be "/images/pic.jpg".

parameters.title: Query Parameters
parameters.name: query_params
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify any optional parameters to add to the URL and refine the request.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.title: Request Payload
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify data, as JSON, to be sent as the request payload (typically for POST or PUT requests).
